info.name: Api
info.description:
## The **Pas**senger **M**anagement **As**sistant

  
(PasMAs) is an open-source web application designed to simplify the management of sightseeing flights on open days for smaller flying clubs. This assistant enables you to organize various flight slots for each plane efficiently. It supports you by handling flight logic calculations such as determining the maximum take-off mass to prevent overloaded flights.

request.description:
However, flightlogic does not perform any calculations except for fuel calculation. This is the first step in the 'flight creation' process. It creates a new flight in the 'RESERVED' status, blocking only the flight slot for any other flight. The arrival time will be determined by the plane's 'FlightDuration' parameter. ## Body: | **Parameter** | required | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | Status | optional for RESERVED
required for BLOCKED | The status of the flight, either "RESERVED" or "BLOCKED". | | DepartureTime | required | The departure time in the format "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM
". | | PlaneId | required | The ID of the plane. | | Description | optional | A description as a string. | | ArrivalTime | optional for RESERVED
required for BLOCKED | The arrival time in the format "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM
".

If not set: The arrival time will be determined by the plane's 'FlightDuration' parameter. | | Passengers | optional for RESERVED
ignored for BLOCKED | A list of passengers. These passenger will not be saved and are only used for weight calculations. | | FirstName (within Passengers) | optional | The first name of the passenger. | | LastName (within Passengers) | optional | The last name of the passenger. | | Weight (within Passengers) | required | The weight of the passenger. | ## Required Role: vendor

request.description:
This is the second step in the 'flight creation' process. It updates a flight from 'reserved' to 'booked' status, performing flight logic calculations such as pilot selection and weight checking. It creates passengers for this flight.

## Parameters

| **Parameter** | required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Status | required | The status of the flight, must be "BOOKED". |
| Description | optional | A description as a string. An empty string means removing the description. |
| Passengers | required | A list of passengers. These passengers will be created for this flight. |
| FirstName (within Passengers) | required | The first name of the passenger. |
| LastName (within Passengers) | required | The last name of the passenger. |
| Weight (within Passengers) | required | The weight of the passenger. |

## Required Role:

vendor
